task.title: Step 1. Verify the Directories in the Previous Version (Manual Start)
task.shortdesc: If the previous version of used a manual start, verify that the directories used to store configuration, data, log, and resource files are outside of $SDC_DIST, the base runtime directory.

context.note: If the previous version used a service start, the default values of the directories are absolute paths that are outside of the $SDC_DIST runtime directory.
context.p: The environment configuration file, $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdc-env.sh, includes environment variables that define the directories. For a manual start, the default values of the directory variables are relative to the $SDC_DIST runtime directory. If you did not modify the directory values in the previous version, modify the values before you upgrade so that the new version can use the same working directories.

step.cmd: Create directories outside of the $SDC_DIST runtime directory for the configuration, data, log, and resource files.
In the $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdc-env.sh file, set the following environment variables to the newly created directories:

ul.li: SDC_DATA - The directory for pipeline state and configuration information.
SDC_RESOURCES - The directory for runtime resource files.

step.cmd: Move all files from the previous directories to the newly created directories.

info.p: Log in to verify that you can use as expected.
